entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 8:28 PM ADT Friday 21 April 2023
